name: Smoked Turkey Pâté
description: This recipe is an excellent way to use leftover meat from a smoked turkey. It came to The Times in 2010, along with a profile of Greenberg Smoked Turkey Inc., a Tyler, Tex., company founded in 1938 by Samuel Isaac Greenberg.
recipeIngredient: 1 jalapeño, halved lengthwise, seeded and thinly sliced
Corn chips, like Fritos, or sturdy potato chips, for serving

recipeInstructions.text: Finely grind the turkey in a food processor. Transfer to a serving bowl, stir in mayonnaise and season to taste with salt and pepper, if using. Top with jalapeño slices and serve as a dip with chips.
